attributes.action: Any MP who fails to honour the Brexit result can never hold public office again
attributes.additional_details: Failure by the MPs to back up the Brexit vote in leaving the EU is the ultimate breach of trust and democracy. If the public fail to believe that their MPs will act on their behalf then trust in the UKs democracy will be lost
attributes.background: MPs should be honouring the will of the British people by making sure that the result be executed and the UK leave the EU in full, no deals, no excuses. MPs attempting to execute their own agenda and wishes against the UK majority will never again be able to hold any public office in any capacity

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
